text: 7.8 Lom 4.15, 5.20, 1 Ko 15.56 Pen tap si tap tɨmel gep ak, ne takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak anɨb ak dɨl gek, mɨdupmɨdup yɨp tɨkjakak. Tɨkjakek, yad binɨb ogɨnap tap kɨlop okok, yad tek yobɨkop agɨl gos ak nepin. Pen takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak ma yobɨkop, tap si tap tɨmel gep ak kɨles ma yobɨkop.
